    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Shelf()
    Constructor Shelf creates a new Shelf instance, it creates a new shelf's matrix and sets all its couples to empty.

    int

    Method additionalPoints calculates the additional points that the player earns by placing tiles in groups of the same tile type inside the shelf.

  • Constructor Details

    • Shelf

      public Shelf()
      Constructor Shelf creates a new Shelf instance, it creates a new shelf's matrix and sets all its couples to empty.

  • Method Details

    • insertTiles

      public void insertTiles(int col, ArrayList<Tile> toInsert)
      Method insertTiles inserts the chosen tiles into the player's shelf. The first tile to be inserted is at the end of the list, while the last tile to be inserted is the first tile of the list.
      Parameters:
      col - - the shelf's column chosen by the player
      toInsert - - the tiles to insert

    • getFreeCol

      public int getFreeCol(int nCol)
      Method getFreeCol takes as an argument the column number and returns the number of empty slots in that column.
      Parameters:
      nCol - - the column number.
      Returns:
      - the number of empty slots in that column.

    • getMaxFree

      public int getMaxFree(int numberColumns)
      Method getMaxFree takes as an argument the number of column in which we want to count the empty spaces. If numberColumn > 4 it means we're about to check all the columns and find the max of empty slots in the entirety of the shelf.
      Parameters:
      numberColumns - - the number of the column to check or a number > 4 for checking all the columns
      Returns:
      the number of empty spaces for a certain column or at all

    • checkShelfFull

      public boolean checkShelfFull()
      Method checkShelfFull returns true if the shelf is full, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      - true if the shelf is full, false otherwise.

    • checkEnoughSpace

      public boolean checkEnoughSpace(ArrayList<Position> choice)
      Method checkEnoughSpace takes as an argument the list of tiles to be inserted and returns true if there is enough space in the shelf to insert them, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      choice - - the list of tiles to be inserted.
      Returns:
      - true if there is enough space in the shelf to insert them, false otherwise.

    • setFreeSlots

      public void setFreeSlots(int row, int column)
      Method setFreeSlots takes as an argument the row and the column of the tile to be removed from the shelf and sets the tile and the state of the corresponding couple to null and empty respectively.
      Parameters:
      row - - the row of the tile.
      column - - the column of the tile.

    • getCoordinate

      public Couple getCoordinate(int row, int col)
      Method getCoordinate takes as an argument the row and the column of the tile to be returned and returns the corresponding couple.
      Parameters:
      row - - the row of the tile.
      col - - the column of the tile.
      Returns:
      - the tile's couple.

    • getCouple

      public Couple getCouple(Position p)
      Method getCouple takes as an argument the position of the couple to be returned and returns the corresponding couple from the shelf.
      Parameters:
      p - - the position of the couple.
      Returns:
      - the couple.

    • additionalPoints

      public int additionalPoints()
      Method additionalPoints calculates the additional points that the player earns by placing tiles in groups of the same tile type inside the shelf.
      Returns:
      - the additional points.

    • getShelfMatrix

      public Couple[][] getShelfMatrix()
      Getter getShelfMatrix returns the shelf's matrix.
      Returns:
      - shelfsMatrix.

    • getCardsAlreadyClaimed

      public List<Integer> getCardsAlreadyClaimed()
      Method getCardsAlreadyClaimed returns the list of the cards that have already been claimed inside the shelf.
      Returns:
      - cardsAlreadyClaimed.

    • clearShelf

      public void clearShelf()
      Method clearShelf clears the shelf. Used only for test purposes.

    • printShelf

      public void printShelf()
      Method printShelf prints the shelf. Used only for test purposes.
